mapper.insert: insert into festival (festival_id,festival_name, festival_content, start_date, end_date, phone_number,origin_image,thumb_image,homepage,address,lat,lng,org_name) values (#{festivalId},#{festivalName},#{festivalContent},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{phoneNumber},#{originImage},#{thumbnailImage},#{homepage},#{address},#{lat},#{lng},#{orgName})
mapper.select:
select festival_id,festival_name, festival_content, date_format(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') start_date, date_format(end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') end_date, phone_number,origin_image,thumb_image,homepage,address,lat,lng,org_name from festival
address like concat(#{area}, '%')
AND date(now()) between date(start_date) and date(end_date)
AND date(start_date) >= now()
order by start_date asc
limit #{start}, #{spp}
